letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive intake to identify the client's specific physical, emotional, or mental well-being challenges and articulate their desired outcomes from aromatherapy.
Based on the assessment, research and propose evidence-informed essential oil blends and application methods, ensuring safety and efficacy tailored to the client's profile.
Develop a personalized, actionable aromatherapy plan, detailing chosen oils, dilution ratios, application frequencies, and practical tips for seamless integration into daily routines.
Regularly track the client's progress, observe their responses to the aromatherapy protocol, and make necessary adjustments to ensure optimal results and client comfort.
Celebrate the client's successes, reinforce positive changes, and empower them with knowledge and resources for continued self-care and sustained holistic well-being.
